verses.roman:
ei-mata pathe yāite śata śata jana
'vaiṣṇava' karena tāṅre kari' āliṅgana

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; pathe—on the way; yāite—while passing; śata śata—hundreds and hundreds; jana—persons; vaiṣṇava—devotees; karena—makes; tāṅre—Him; kari'-doing; āliṅgana—embracing.
translation: Thus many hundreds of people became Vaiṣṇavas when they passed the Lord on the way and were embraced by Him.
